title: New Mix: Angel Olsen, Perfume Genius, Soccer Mommy, more
description:
All Songs host Bob Boilen shares his favorite new tracks of the week, including songs of love from Angel Olsen and Soccer Mommy, a new one from the upcoming Perfume Genius album Ugly Season and more.

Featured Songs And Artists:
1. Perfume Genius: "Pop Song," from Ugly Season
2. Zola Jesus: "Lost," from Arkhon
3. Arooj Aftab: "Udhero Na (feat. Anoushka Shankar)," from Vulture Prince (Deluxe Edition)
4. Angel Olsen: "All The Good Times," from Big Time
5. Saya Gray: "IF THERE'S NO SEAT IN THE SKY (WILL YOU FORGIVE ME???)," from 19 MASTERS
6. Soccer Mommy: "Shotgun," from Sometimes, Forever
